subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Patton, a five-time N.C.A.A. champion at U.S.C., won the 200 meters and anchored the team that won the 4x100-meter relay at the London Games in 1948.
snippet: Mr. Patton, a five-time N.C.A.A. champion at U.S.C., won the 200 meters and anchored the team that won the 4x100-meter relay at the London Games in 1948.
